text: Pen binɨb God man ne alaŋ mɨdebɨm okok, mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨmɨb agak. Binɨb God yɨl mɨdebɨm okok sek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok sek, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok sek, mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨmɨb agak. Taun Babilon anɨb ak nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gup ak, God nɨgup ak nɨm, nop pen bɨlok nɨŋɨd yul awl yɨbɨl ñub agak. Anɨb ak nɨbi mɨdupsek mɨñmɨñ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb agak.
